subject: Question about purchase
description_text: Hi, this is about my purchase #SSN3453. I have received one part of it, but I am still waiting for another part. Could you please tell me if everything is alright? The last status I saw was from December 7th and there has been no further information.

conversations.body_text: Hi Nika Nika, We apologize for the inconvenience. Your tracking link has stopped updating. We will contact the carrier to investigate on your behalf. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2532801900302823
Thank you for your response. I will be waiting.
Hi Nika Nika, Here is the another tracking number : YWUA00000000309992NGUS . You can track it via https://www.17track.net/en. You package was delivered on 2025-12-08
Yes, I have received it. Thank you
